svg.text: News and Links
Top
* Hard Fork 2 Spurious Dragon is near. At block 2675000, EIP 155 (relay
attack protect), 160 (EXP price increase), 161 (adios DoS spam), and 170
(contract code size limit) take effect, then coding begins for the
Metropolis release.
Hard Fork 2 Spurious Dragon is near. At block 2675000, EIP 155 (relay
attack protect), 160 (EXP price increase), 161 (adios DoS spam), and 170
(contract code size limit) take effect, then coding begins for the
Metropolis release.
* Latest HF2-ready clients: Geth 1.5.2 (stable: Geth 1.4.19 ) and
Parity 1.4.4 (stable: 1.3.12 ). New Mist will be here on Monday, when
the Mist devs decide on stable or beta . Why might you want the latest
beta instead of the stable? Geth : Upgraded APIs. Light client. Swarm.
RPC Subscriptions. “first experimental attempt at providing true Android
and iOS library reusability of our codebase” We discussed Parity ’s new
features last week, but click the link again for a reminder.
Latest HF2-ready clients: Geth 1.5.2 (stable: Geth 1.4.19 ) and Parity
1.4.4 (stable: 1.3.12 ). New Mist will be here on Monday, when the Mist
devs decide on stable or beta .
* Why might you want the latest beta instead of the stable? Geth :
Upgraded APIs. Light client. Swarm. RPC Subscriptions. “first
experimental attempt at providing true Android and iOS library
reusability of our codebase” We discussed Parity ’s new features last
week, but click the link again for a reminder.
* Geth : Upgraded APIs. Light client. Swarm. RPC Subscriptions. “first
experimental attempt at providing true Android and iOS library
reusability of our codebase”
* We discussed Parity ’s new features last week, but click the link
again for a reminder.
* Out: The DAO. In: Charity DAO . I don’t see the point of Charity DAO,
just like I didn’t with The DAO. Why would I want others to choose my
profit and non-profit investments? But hey, YMMV.
Out: The DAO. In: Charity DAO . I don’t see the point of Charity DAO,
just like I didn’t with The DAO. Why would I want others to choose my
profit and non-profit investments? But hey, YMMV.
Tech
* Ruby-ethereum 0.11.0
* Christian Reitwiessner: the first self-referential smart contract
* The test network has been reset . Adios Morden, hola Ropsten.
* David Burela: How to install Truffle & TestRPC on Windows and
Configuring Visual Studio code for Ethereum
* Consensys published Ethereum Contract Security Techniques and Tips
* Video: Péter Szilágyi on Immutability in Go at the Go conference
* Ethereum on Raspberry Pi update
Ecosystem

* Ujo: What Does Blockchain Mean for the Music Industry?
